name: TL1
description: A Telegram Torrent (and youtube-dl) Leecher based on Pyrogram.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: Create a Super Group in Telegram, add @missrose_bot to the group, and send /id in the chat, to get this value..

OWNER_ID.description: should be an integer. ID of owner of bot

UPLOAD_AS_DOC.description: Takes two option True or False. If True file will be uploaded as document. This is for people who wants video files as document instead of streamable.

TG_MAX_FILE_SIZE.description: max file size limit for Telegram Upload .. value should be in bytes like 2000000000

ARIA_TWO_STARTED_PORT.description: should be an integer. The port on which aria2c daemon must start, and keep listening ..default is port 6800

EDIT_SLEEP_TIME_OUT.description: should be an integer. Number of seconds to wait before editing a message.

MAX_TG_SPLIT_FILE_SIZE.description: max file size limit for Telegram Upload in Splitting.. Like If you send 10gb file it will send in 2gb pieces..value should be in bytes like 2000000000

MAX_TIME_TO_WAIT_FOR_TORRENTS_TO_START.description: should be an integer. Number of seconds to wait before cancelling a torrent.

TG_OFFENSIVE_API.description: should be an URL accepting the FormParams {i}, {m}, and {t}

CUSTOM_FILE_NAME.description: custom filename for every single files or folders on leeching completion....

LEECH_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

INDEX_LINK.description: (Without / at last of the link, otherwise u will get error) During creating index, plz fill Default Root ID with the id of your DESTINATION_FOLDER after creating. Otherwise index will not work properly.

GLEECH_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom gleech command like /gleech1@urgroupname and so on. Default is /gleech

TELEGRAM_LEECH_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom tleech command like /tleech1@urgroupname and so on. Default is /tleech

TELEGRAM_LEECH_UNZIP_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom tleech command like /tleechunzip1@urgroupname and so on. Default is /tleechunzip

YTDL_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom ytdl command like ytdl1@urgroupname and so on. Default is /ytdl.

GYTDL_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom gytdl command like gytdl1@urgroupname and so on. Default is /ytdl.

PYTDL_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom pytdl command like pytdl1@urgroupname and so on. Default is /pytdl.

GET_SIZE_G.description: Enter your custom getsize command like getsize@urgroupname and so on. Default is /getsize.

RENAME_COMMAND.description: Custom Rename Command Which should Be Set Via Vars Default is /rename.

TOGGLE_VID.description: custom command for /renewmeCustom Cmd for TOGGLE_DOC default is /togglevid.

TOGGLE_DOC.description: Custom Cmd for TOGGLE_DOC default is /toggledoc

DESTINATION_FOLDER.description: Enter your Cloud folder NAME(not IDðŸ˜…) in which you want to upload/store your files.

CUSTOM_FILE_NAME.description: fill with name u want to prefix the file name like ur channel usernameðŸ™Š, keep empty for do nothing, but add to ur config vars even without input.
